required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study of Once Monthly Intravenous Mircera for the Maintenance Treatment of Dialysis Patients With Chronic Renal Anemia.
clinical_study.official_title: A Single Arm, Open Label Study to Assess the Efficacy, Safety and Tolerability of Once-monthly Administration of Intravenous MIRCERA for the Maintenance of Haemoglobin Levels in Dialysis Patients With Chronic Renal Anaemia

brief_summary.textblock: This single arm study will evaluate the maintenance of hemoglobin levels, safety and tolerability of once-monthly intravenous administration of Mircera in dialysis patients with chronic renal anemia. Patients will receive intravenous Mircera (120, 200 or 360 micrograms) every four weeks depending on the previous dose of epoetin alfa administered in the week preceding first study drug administration. Patients will be treated for 12 weeks with follow up 2 weeks after the last treatment visit. The anticipated time on study treatment is 3-12 months, and the target sample size is 100-500 individuals.

primary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants Maintaining Mean Hemoglobin Levels Within the Target Range During the Last 4 Weeks of the Treatment Period (Weeks 8 to 12)
primary_outcome.time_frame: Weeks 8 to 12 (Last 4 weeks of treatment period)
primary_outcome.description: Participants maintaining mean hemoglobin (Hb) concentration within the target range i.e. 10.0 - 12.0 gram per deciliter (g/dL) during last 4 weeks (Weeks 8 to 12) of treatment period (TP) were reported. Total duration for treatment period was 12 weeks. Stability verification period of 2-weeks was conducted before treatment period. The reference Hb concentrations were based upon the mean of the assessments at Weeks -2, -1 and Week 0. The target range for assessment was set at the reference value Hb +/- 1 g/dL but not >12.0 g/dL and not <10.0 g/dL.

secondary_outcome.measure: Mean Hemoglobin Concentration Between Stability Verification Period (Weeks -2 to -1) and Treatment Period (Weeks 8 to 12)
secondary_outcome.description: The mean change in Hb concentration between reference stability verification period (SVP) and in last 4 weeks (Weeks 8 to 12) of treatment period (TP) was reported. Duration for SVP was 2 weeks followed by treatment period of 12 weeks. The reference Hb concentrations were based upon the mean of the assessments at Weeks -2, -1 and Week 0. The target range for assessment was set at the reference value hemoglobin +/- 1 g/dL but not >12.0 g/dL and not <10.0 g/dL.

secondary_outcome.measure: Mean Time Participants Spent Having Hemoglobin Range of 10.0 to 12.0 g/dL
secondary_outcome.description: Mean time participants spent having hemoglobin range of 10.0 to 12.0 g/dL was reported. The reference Hb concentrations were based upon the mean of the assessments at Weeks -2, -1 and Week 0. The target range for assessment was set at the reference value hemoglobin +/- 1 gram per deciliter but not >12.0 g/dL and not <10.0 g/dL.

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of Participants With Treatment Emergent Adverse Events, Serious Adverse Events and Deaths
secondary_outcome.description: Participants with treatment emergent adverse events (TEAEs), serious adverse events (SAEs) and deaths in the overall study were reported. An Adverse Event (AE) is any untoward medical occurrence in a participant or clinical investigation participant administered a pharmaceutical product and which does not necessarily have to have a causal relationship with this treatment.

secondary_outcome.measure: Mean Change From Baseline in Heart Rate Over Time
secondary_outcome.description: Mean change from Baseline (Week -1) to end of the treatment (Week 12) in heart rate was reported. Baseline measure was considered as (Week -1) evaluation for this parameter.

secondary_outcome.measure: Mean Change From Baseline in Blood Pressure (Systolic Blood Pressure and Diastolic Blood Pressure) Over Time
secondary_outcome.description: Mean change from Baseline (Week -2) to end of the treatment (Week 12) in systolic blood pressure (SBP) and diastolic blood pressure (DBP) before and after dialysis was reported. Baseline measure was considered as (Week -2) evaluation for this parameter.

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of Participants With Abnormal Electrocardiogram
secondary_outcome.description: Participants with abnormal electrocardiogram were reported.

secondary_outcome.measure: Mean Values of White Blood Cells and Platelets Over Time
secondary_outcome.description: Mean values of white blood cells (WBCs), and platelets at Weeks -2, 4, 8, and 12 were reported.

secondary_outcome.measure: Mean Values of Hypochromic Red Blood Cells Over Time
secondary_outcome.description: Mean values of hypochromic red blood cells (RBCs) at Weeks -2, 4, 8, and 12 were reported.

secondary_outcome.measure: Mean Corpuscular Volume Levels Over Time
secondary_outcome.description: Mean corpuscular volume (MCV) is a measure of the average red blood cell volume. MCV levels at Weeks -2, 4, 8, and 12 were reported.

secondary_outcome.measure: Mean Values of Iron Parameters (Serum Iron and Total Iron Binding Capacity) Over Time
secondary_outcome.description: Mean values of serum iron and total iron binding capacity (TIBC) were reported.

secondary_outcome.measure: Mean Values of Serum Ferritin Over Time
secondary_outcome.description: Mean values of serum ferritin were reported.

secondary_outcome.measure: Mean Values of Transferrin Over Time
secondary_outcome.description: Mean values of transferrin were reported.

secondary_outcome.measure: Mean Values of Transferrin Saturation Over Time
secondary_outcome.description: Mean values of Transferrin Saturation (TSAT) were reported.

secondary_outcome.measure: Mean Values of Serum Albumin and Serum Globulin Over Time
secondary_outcome.description: Mean values of serum albumin and serum globulin were reported.

secondary_outcome.measure: Mean Values of Aspartate Aminotransferase, Alanine Transaminase and Serum Alkaline Phosphatase Over Time
secondary_outcome.description: Mean values of aspartate aminotransferase (AST), alanine transaminase (ALT) and serum alkaline phosphatase were reported.

secondary_outcome.measure: Mean Values of Serum Creatinine, Blood Urea Nitrogen, Serum Phosphate and Serum Bilirubin Over Time
secondary_outcome.description: Mean values of serum creatinine, blood urea nitrogen (BUN), serum phosphate and serum bilirubin were reported.

secondary_outcome.measure: Mean Values of Serum Sodium and Serum Potassium Over Time
secondary_outcome.description: Mean values of serum sodium and serum potassium were reported.

arm_group.description: Participant with chronic renal anemia will receive methoxy polyethylene glycol-epoetin beta [Mircera] intravenously (IV) [(120, 200 or 360 micrograms (mcg)] every 4 weeks for 12 weeks.

intervention.description: iv (120, 200 or 360 micrograms) every 4 weeks for 12 weeks.

facility.name: Manipal Institute of Nephrology and Urology; Nephrology
Columbia Asia Medical Centre - Hebbal; Nephrology
Nizam's Institute of Medical Sciences; Nephrology
Wockhardt Hospital and Kidney Institute; Nephrology
Fortis Flt. Lt. Rajan Dhall Hospital; Nephrology

participant_flow.recruitment_details: A total of 132 participants were enrolled from 26 August 2008 to 12 September 2009 at 11 study sites in India.

group.title: Mircera
group.description: Eligible participants with chronic renal anemia were administered methoxy polyethylene glycol-epoetin beta [Mircera] intravenously (IV) [(120, 200 or 360 micrograms (mcg)] every 4 weeks for 12 weeks.

baseline.population: Safety population included all enrolled participants who received at least one dose of study medication.

reported_events.desc: SAEs and non-serious AEs were reported for the safety population which included all participants who received at least one dose of study medication.

group.title: Mircera
group.description: Eligible participants with chronic renal anemia were administered methoxy polyethylene glycol-epoetin beta [Mircera] intravenously (IV) [(120, 200 or 360 micrograms (mcg)] every 4 weeks for 12 weeks.

certain_agreements.pi_employee: Principal Investigators are NOT employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: The Study being conducted under this Agreement is part of the Overall Study. Investigator is free to publish in reputable journals or to present at professional conferences the results of the Study, but only after the first publication or presentation that involves the Overall Study. The Sponsor may request that Confidential Information be deleted and/or the publication be postponed in order to protect the Sponsor's intellectual property rights.
